name: CQ.Ext.state.CookieProvider
doc:
The default Provider implementation which saves state via cookies.
Usage:
 var cp = new CQ.Ext.s...

configs.name: domain
configs.doc: The domain to save the cookie for. Note that you cannot specify a different domain than your page...

configs.name: expires
configs.doc: The cookie expiration date (defaults to 7 days from now)

configs.name: path
configs.doc: The path for which the cookie is active (defaults to root '/' which makes it active for all pages...

configs.name: secure
configs.doc: True if the site is using SSL (defaults to false)

methods.name: clear
methods.doc: Clears a value from the state

methods.name: decodeValue
methods.doc: Decodes a string previously encoded with encodeValue.

methods.name: encodeValue
methods.doc: Encodes a value including type information.  Decode with decodeValue.

methods.name: get
methods.doc: Returns the current value for a key

methods.name: set
methods.doc: Sets the value for a key

events.name: statechange
events.doc: Fires when a state change occurs.
